subclause.title: SubClause
subclause.p: A swimming pool with a depth of water more than 300 mm and which is associated with a Class 2 or 3 building or Class 4 part of a building, must have suitable barriers to restrict access by young children to the immediate pool surrounds in accordance with AS 1926.1 and AS 1926.2.

subclause.title: SubClause
subclause.p: A water recirculation system in a swimming pool with a depth of water more than 300 mm must comply with AS 1926.3.

subclause.title: SubClause
subclause.p: For the purpose of clause 6.1.1 of AS 1926.3, a skimmer box is an outlet, and must have a means of releasing the vacuum pressure should the suction become blocked.

subclause.title: SubClause
